root.name: Phantasie III : The Wrath of Nikademus
root.description: Phantasie 3: Wrath of Nikademus was a top down party based role playing game. It featured limited graphics but the ability to create a party consisting of multiple classes and who could order themselves in ranks in order to increase the strategy of combat. The most unique feature of adventure was support for a system of permanent bodily injury where any limb, your torso or your head could suffer lasting damage. This damage ranged from being injured, to broken or 'gone'. As expected missing one or both legs would limited movement, missing arms limited combat ability and having missing head or torso was fatal. Fortunately the system also supported a clerical class that could repair characters once a sufficiently high level was reached.
